title: BRIEF-GRG Banking Equipment lowers amount raised in private placement
text:
BRIEF-GRG Banking Equipment lowers amount raised in private placement 
Oct 9 Grg Banking Equipment Co Ltd 
* Says revises down share private placement size, to raise up to 3.14 billion yuan ($494.88 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1QdA4JG 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3450 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
